name: SPACE RUNNER (Kathan Sahu)
description:
Spaceship game

This is a 2d space shooter game in which we can play as a rocket we can destroy our enemies ie asteroids or aliens

We can go as far as we want to go

Different menus in our game

1) Main menu- at the starting of the game

2) Game- here the game will be played 

3) Restart menu- when we lose this menu will appear 

4) Pause menu- if we pause the game this menu will appear
